subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
Television
Cable Television
Alpine Skiing
Beach Volleyball
lead_paragraph: A prime-time Olympic show on NBC is an exercise in short-attention viewing, and a sport like hockey, which can’t be chopped up, was relegated to cable.
snippet: A prime-time Olympic show on NBC is an exercise in short-attention viewing, and a sport like hockey, which can’t be chopped up, was relegated to cable.
